about_the_game:
Terror of the Seven Seas is the pirate game you have always dreamed of, combining ship combat and sailing with a massive living open world full of exploration and adventures.

BE THE CAPTAIN YOU ALWAYS WANTED TO BE

  • Become a Legendary Pirate! Live a life of freedom and plunder a mountain of gold.

  • Become a Naval Officer! Serve your king, raise a mighty fleet, and conquer the world for the glory of your nation.

  • Become a Wealthy Trader! Run your own treasure fleets, carry unimaginable wealth to all corners of the world, and battle the pirates trying to plunder it from you.

  • Become a World Renowned Explorer! Find lost temples and artifacts, hunt whales and sea monsters. Maybe you will even find the dream of every conquistador: El Dorado!

EXPLORE A MASSIVE OPEN WORLD

Enjoy and explore a massive hand built version of Earth. Sail the Seven Seas and all that it provides, from the warmth of the Caribbean to the cold winds of the Arctic.

See the bustle and industry of Europe and sail the trade winds to Asia and the Americas.

Visit, trade with, and conquer over 120 ports.

A fully uninterrupted open world; follow the sail winds of Magellan and circumnavigate the globe!

NAVAL COMBAT BAR NONE

  • Sink your enemies with a wide array of weapons. From cannonballs and mortars to explosive barrels and fire ships!

  • Use skills such as anchor turns and explosive cannonballs to aid you in combat.

  • Weaken your enemies and board them for extra rewards.

  • Maneuver your ships with the wind and devastate your enemies with raking shots.

  • Command a fleet of up to seven ships to aid you in battle.

BUILD A MIGHTY ARMADA

Over 30 detailed period correct ships, all the way from 6 gun sloops to massive 160 gun Man'O'Wars!


Including such historical classics as:

  • Wasa

  • Victory

  • Constitution

  • Endeavour

  • Santisima Trinidad

A LIVING BREATHING WORLD

  • Trade galleons carry vast wealth across the seas while pirates hunt them in search of gold.

  • Fierce pirate hunters await their chance at vengeance and justice.

  • Navies dynamically war on the shores and open seas for control of territory.

  • Sea monsters lurk below the surface, eagerly awaiting the next unsuspecting ship to become their prey.

  • Nations create alliances and start wars in their quest for dominance over land and sea.

  • Witness, cause and join massive naval battles.

TRAIN YOUR CAPTAIN

Gain experience and rank! Use your status to gather mighty crewmen, loyal allies, and special skills to offer you advantages inside and outside of combat.

SEE THE WONDERS OF THE SEVEN SEAS

From fiery volcanoes to sunken treasure and ancient temples. Veer into the mysteries of the occult and more!

Find treasure, allies, and legendary equipment hidden inside.

ROARING SEAS

Dynamic weather and time of day offer an ever changing environment. From calm, clear sunrises to fierce ship sized waves, howling winds, and pouring rains. Witness mighty thunder storms and battle fierce tornadoes!

CHOOSE YOU ALLIANCES

Choose from 14 different factions to enlist with, from all over the world! Affect their destinies and rewrite their history to your liking.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR SHIPS

Gather upgrades from enemies, find them from hidden treasure, or plunder them from merchants. Use them to enhance your ship and crew in a variety of ways:

  • Use copper plated hulls to improve your ship's speed

  • Equip bronze cannons to increase accuracy and damage of your cannonballs.

  • Customize sails that will forever symbolize the might of your fleet.

And dozens of more ways to turn your ship into one that you have always dreamed of!

So what are you waiting for? Scroll up and set sail today!

highlighted.name: Sea monsters do not exist! Anymore...
It’s not Delusion if you are Grand

name: Terror of the Seven Seas

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Terror of the Seven Seas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 / Intel HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500K / AMD Ryzen 5 2500x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Become a Mighty Captain in a Age of sail naval combat game, set in all of the Seven Seas! Sail the entire world: conquering, plundering, exploring and trading along the way! Gather your crew, ready your ship, hoist your sails and enter a world of swashbuckling and piracy!
